description: Completed Secondary School education with a focus on Science. Excelled in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics, laying a strong foundation for engineering studies. Actively participated in science fairs and math competitions, winning several awards at the district level.
achievements: Secured 10th place in the Dhaka District Science Fair (2017)
Received the 'Best Student' award for outstanding academic performance
Won 2nd place in the inter-school Football competition (2018)

description: Completed Higher Secondary education with a focus on Science. Excelled in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics, laying a strong foundation for engineering studies. Actively participated in science fairs and math competitions, winning several awards at the district level.

description: Intensive 8-month program covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and database management. Completed multiple projects including a social media app and an e-commerce site.

description: Rigorous engineering curriculum with strong emphasis on algorithms, systems design, and applied mathematics. Final year project on distributed systems for rural connectivity.
achievements: AIUB Merit Scholarship recipient for 6 semesters
